      • FinalFighter

            Weapon enemyWeapon,
            Armor enemyArmor,
            boolean isStartingFight)
        Constructor for FinalFighter class.
        Parameters:
        opponentHP - amount of HP your foe has.
        enemyWeapon - the kind of weapon your foe has.
        enemyArmor - the kind of armor your foe has.
        isStartingFight - Is this starting fight? (OBSOLETE)

    • Method Detail

      • encounter

        public static java.lang.String encounter(java.lang.String enemytype,
                         double enemyhp,
                         Armor enemyarmor,
                         Weapon enemyweapon)
        Instantiates an encounter between the protagonist and a monster.
        Parameters:
        enemytype - name of enemy
        enemyhp - amount of hitpoints enemy has
        enemyarmor - type of armor the enemy wears
        enemyweapon - type of weapon the enemy wields
        Returns:
        String describing the events that passed.

      • startCombat

        public static java.lang.String startCombat()
        Starts a battle between the current monster (delineated in the FinalFighter constructor) and the protagonist. Iterates attackTurn() until someone dies.
        Returns:
        String describing the events that passed.

      • endCombat

        public static java.lang.String endCombat()
        This method signifies the end of an encounter. It checks to see who died (the protagonist or the enemy) and, if the protagonist won, it returns the amount of experience the protagonist gains based on the amount of overkill he/she did.
        Returns:
        String describing the events that passed.

      • attackTurn

        public static java.lang.String attackTurn()
        Now using 100% more Weapon and Armor class! This method does one round of attacks; you attack the enemy, and the enemy attacks you. It takes into account weapon and armor strengths, as well as your stats.
        Parameters:
        masterProtagonist - .p.getMyWeapon() your equipped weapon
        defaultEnemyWeapon - your enemy's equipped weapon
        masterProtagonist - .getMyArmor() your equipped armor
        enemyArmor - your enemy's equipped armor
        enemyType - the name of your fearsome foe

      • examine

        public static java.lang.String examine()
        This returns the description of your fearsome foe
        Returns:
        a long string with all your current enemy's gear.

      • run

        public static java.lang.String run()
        You run from combat.
        Returns:
        outputs a string which shows what you just did

      • checkInv

        public static java.lang.String checkInv()
        Checks the gear you currently have equipped.
        Returns:
        the gear you have equipped.
